Text: Thousands of studies are underway to find treatments for #COVID19.  Researchers are taking three different approaches. Here's everything you need to know  ➡️ https://t.co/yUTDY4TBMb | #coronavirus https://t.co/AW4GR1BKix

Powerful words from @realDonaldTrump tonight making it clear all Americans are going to be protected.This is what we elected President Trump to do - to lead with bold, dramatic action. These lawless riots ; acts of violence will not continue indefinitely. They will end now.

A major new study in the Lancet, finds✅face coverings are very effective. ✅keeping one meter away from someone with #covid19 massively reduces your risk of infection.✅extending to 2 meters halves your chances againHow do press report this? 👇https://t.co/7nGz1eW7BM
Disenfranchising BAME MP on today of all days. All MPs need to stand together against this. Vital that basic human values ; fundamental democratic principles trump party politics

NEW: #COVID19 has exposed serious challenges to #Nepal's federal governance system. @Anurag_Acharya argues that an effective response calls for greater devolution and more collaboration among the three tiers of government: https://t.co/DcEQBWRp4y https://t.co/UFJL4qUWJL

You may think it's only a small thing that the military used helicopters to intimidate American civilians in the nation's capital. It's not. A line was crossed tonight. There will be other lines. This is Trump conditioning them to cross those lines.

Appalling figures out today show huge increase in number of people with learning disabilities who have died in care during #Covid_19 pandemic. @UKLabour has pressed for this data to be published for weeks. Govt must now urgently include people in care under 65 yrs old for testing

Thank you @Keir_Starmer ; @EdwardJDavey for adding to calls for @PHE_uk and @MattHancock to publish @ProfKevinFenton's #COVID19 #BAMEreportWe need to the learn key lessons and  rapidly implement an action plan to safeguard vulnerable groups.#ProtectTheFrontline
@Breaking911 There is only one man standing between us and total anarchy in America - President Trump. Hope everybody understands that at least now.
